Header.title: InsightLens
Header.paragraph: Unlock the Power of Visual Recognition.

About.paragraph: What is InsightLens? InsightLens is an innovative mobile application that leverages AI-powered image recognition to identify objects and provide valuable insights.

Services.name: Identify target
Services.text: Efficiently and accurately identify photographed objects.

Services.name: Login, registration, and password retrieval
Services.text: Allow users to securely protect their data.

Services.name: History record
Services.text: Users can view their past search history and learn new things.

Features.title: LLM Based
Features.text: Use the most advanced LLM technology to identify objects around you.

Features.title: More precise
Features.text: Use positioning technology to assist LLM in identification, which is more accurate than competitors.

Features.title: Expert team
Features.text: A team from the world's top universities is responsible for the project.

Features.title: Easy to use
Features.text: Just install it and you can try all the features.
